definition: to order à la carte/single point (of measurement, mounting etc)

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: The remote search server is a single point of failure.
sentences.chinese: 遠程搜索服務器是一個單點故障點。

sentences.english: Use the ZPE (zero point energy) , revise the whole energy.
sentences.chinese: 對於單點能採用零點能校正。

sentences.english: Single sign-on is provided through the application server's use of the directory.
sentences.chinese: 單點登錄功能是由應用服務器使用目錄提供的。

sentences.english: At first the artists of the Renaissance only had single-point perspective.
sentences.chinese: 一開始，文藝復興時期的畫家們只會運用單點透視。

sentences.english: Single sign-on capabilities with the operating system are built into the platform by default.
sentences.chinese: 操作系統的單點登錄功能默認內置在該平臺中。

sentences.english: They find use in high-speed data collection, visual one-point probing.
sentences.chinese: 傳感器適用於高速數據收集以及視覺單點探測。

sentences.english: It also features role-based security and a single sign-on capability.
sentences.chinese: 還提供基於角色的安全性和單點登錄功能。

sentences.english: The article designs the single-intersection fuzzy controller in detail.
sentences.chinese: 本論文詳細進行了單點模糊控制器的設計。

sentences.english: With this topology, we have a single point of failure.
sentences.chinese: 在該拓撲中，有一個單點故障。

sentences.english: Instead, there was a single point of failure that shouldn't have been there.
sentences.chinese: 相反，它存在一個不應該有的單點故障。

sentences.english: There are data sets in iteration that converge to single points, called attractive fixed points.
sentences.chinese: 在迭代過程中有數據集匯聚成單點，叫做吸性不動點。

sentences.english: Adding the single sign-on feature is a two-step process.
sentences.chinese: 添加單點登錄功能的過程包含兩個步驟。

sentences.english: You have single points of update for each attribute, making it easier to modify and to test.
sentences.chinese: 可單點更新每個屬性，這使得修改和測試更加容易。

sentences.english: It is applicable for single gluing of various loud-speakers and components.
sentences.chinese: 適用於各種揚聲器及元件單點打膠。

sentences.english: Point-to-point unicast messages have been conventionally used to achieve barrier synchronization.
sentences.chinese: 過去一直用點對點單點傳送信息取得屏蔽同步。
